Definition at line 415 of file ebi_lcd.c.

void LCD_CharDisplay ( u32  Line_Num,
u32  Column,
u32  Ascii 
)

Display one character (16 dots width, 24 dots height).

Parameters:
Line_Num,:Where to display the character, should be LINE0 ~ LINE9.
Column,:start column address.
Ascii,:character ascii code, must be between 0x20 and 0x7E.
Return values:
None

Definition at line 437 of file ebi_lcd.c.

u32  Y_Location,
u16 *  Cptr 
)

Draw one character.

Parameters:
X_Location,:the position of display line, should be LINE0 ~ LINE9.
Y_Location,:the start position of character.
Cptr,:point to font data of character.
Return values:
None

u32  Y_Location,
u32  Length,
u32  Direction 
)

Display a line.

Parameters:
X_Location,:specify the X position.
Y_Location,:specify the Y position.
Length,:line length.
Direction,:line direction. This parameter can be one of the following values:
  • Vertical
  • Horizontal
Return values:
None

Parameters:

Return values:

Parameters:
LCD_Reg_Index,:address of the selected register.
Return values:
Valueof the selected register.
